Topic: Illustrate plants with and without water and light.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw plants with water and with light, showing them healthy and growing.
The student can draw plants without water, showing them wilting or not growing well.
The student can draw plants without light, showing them unhealthy or not growing well.
The student can use the drawings to show that plants need both water and light to live and grow.
The student can identify patterns in their drawings to demonstrate that all plants need water and light.
